concept.title: What's New

Features and Functionality
The following features and functionality have been added to : =======
This is the first release of .
Updates >>>>>>> 963943a... Added "What's New" section
Terraform If you have worked with Cloud Foundry before, will allow you <<<<<<< HEAD to work in a familiar environment where instead of BOSH, uses Terraform, a service management command-line tool.
If you have worked with HPE Helion Stackato or with the HPE Helion Development Platform before, will allow you to work with , a new command-line administration utility that shares some functionality with Kato. For more information, see the . communicates with Consul instead of Cloud Controller and runs within the Docker overlay Virtual Extensible LAN (VXLAN).Link to the Dev Center: http://dev.hpcloud.com/ ======= to work in a familiar environment that uses Terraform, a service management command-line tool, instead of BOSH.
If you have worked with the HPE Helion Development Platform before, will allow you to work in a familiar environment that uses gato, a new command-line administration utility, instead of kato. For more information, see the . >>>>>>> 963943a... Added "What's New" section
